Skill.name: Meat Shield
Skill.description: Reduce damage dealt and reduce damage for 3 turns

Skill.name: Shoulder Charge
Skill.description: Throw your full weight into your enemy

Skill.name: Holmgang
Skill.description: Prevent most attacks from setting your health below 1 for 2 turns

Skill.name: Infuriate
Skill.description: Guarantee your next 2 physical attacks to be critical hits

Skill.name: Fellcleave
Skill.description: Rupture your enemies very being, 40% chance of casting again to a max of 5 casts

Skill.name: Splatter
Skill.description: Execute an enemy with half your DEF or lower

Skill.name: Earth Cutter
Skill.description: Eradicate your foe with earthen fury

Skill.name: Titan's Wrath
Skill.description: Unleash infinite rage on your foe

Skill.name: Chaos Vortex
Skill.description: Spin your blade at ungodly speeds

Skill.name: MASTERY - Absolute Unit
Skill.description: For 2 turns, triple your DEF stat

Skill.name: MASTERY - Dead Man Walking
Skill.description: Unleash a relentless toreent of slashes equal to your current HP

Skill.name: MASTERY - Best Defense
Skill.description: Heal yourself for the total HP of your entire party combined
